Question: Describe a two‑card combo that lets you use a key power twice in one round.
Answer: Use Witch to straighten the Athanor after its first use, then activate Athanor again.
Rationale: Witch straightens any component; Athanor power then available again.:contentReference[oaicite:80]{index=80}:contentReference[oaicite:81]{index=81}
